t: For the choir director. A Psalm of David.
How*pn long, O Lord?*s Will You forget me forever? How*ln long will You hide Your face from me?
How*ln long shall I take counsel in my soul, Having*iln sorrow in my heart all the day? How*ln long will my enemy be exalted over me?
Consider*ln and*i answer me, O Lord*s my God; Enlighten*ln my eyes, or I will sleep the sleep*i of*i death,
And*ln my enemy will say, “I have overcome him,” And*iln my adversaries will rejoice when I am shaken.
But*ln I have trusted in Your lovingkindness; My*ln heart shall rejoice in Your salvation.
I*ln will sing to the Lord,*s Because*ln He has dealt bountifully with me.
